ca.ualberta.cs.xpertsapp.views

Class TradeListActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.xpertsapp.views.TradeListActivity

  • public class TradeListActivity
extends Activity
    Activity to view incoming and outgoing trades a user has. It is called from MainActivity. By clicking on a trade, the user can view the trade details.

      This initializes the tradeListAdapter to display the trades a user has.

      This initializes the tradeListAdapter to display the trades a user has.
      void viewIncoming(View view)
      This changes the list of trades that's displayed on the screen to the ones the current user has received.
      void viewOutgoing(View view)
      This changes the list of trades that's displayed on the screen to the ones the current user has sent.
